Package gov.noaa.ngs.grid

Class GridManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.noaa.ngs.grid.GridManager
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Nadcon, Vertcon
    public abstract class GridManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Encapsulates methods for parsing and returning a block of data from a grid that's in ".b" format
    Version:
    1.0 Date: 09/30/2016
    Author:
    Krishna.Tadepalli

      • getInstance

        public static GridManager getInstance​(java.lang.String region,
                                      java.lang.String srcDatum,
                                      java.lang.String destDatum,
                                      java.lang.String gridParm,
                                      java.lang.String gridType,
                                      java.lang.String gridName)
        returns an instance of GridManager
        Parameters:
        region - a geographic region where grids are available
        srcDatum - input datum
        destDatum - output datum
        gridParm - a parameter for which a grid is defined
        gridType - a type that identifies transformation or error grid
        gridName - type of transformation
        Returns:
        a reference to GridManager

      • getBlock

        public abstract double[] getBlock​(double lat,
                                  double lon,
                                  int numRows,
                                  int numCols)
        returns a block of numRowsXnumCols surrounding a given point
        Parameters:
        lat - latitude
        lon - longitude
        numRows - number of rows in a block
        numCols - number of columns in a block
        Returns:
        a block of data

      • getGridFile

        public abstract java.lang.String getGridFile()
        defines a grid file to be used for processing
        Returns:
        grid filename

      • getCells

        protected abstract double[] getCells​(java.io.RandomAccessFile gridfh,
                                     int heightOffset,
                                     int widthOffset,
                                     int rows,
                                     int cols)
        returns a block rowsXcols cells at a given location in the grid
        Parameters:
        gridfh - a reference to grid file
        heightOffset - offset to be applied to grid height
        widthOffset - offset to be applied to grid width
        rows - number of grid rows to be returned
        cols - number of grid columns to be returned
        Returns:
        a block of grid cells defined by rowsXcols

      • rankBlock

        public int rankBlock​(double[] block)
        ranks a given 3X3 block based on missing data, if any
        Parameters:
        block - a block of cells to be checked
        Returns:
        3=3X3 block is usable (no missing data), 2=2X2 block is usable( some missing data), 1=block is not usable(many missing data cells)

      • getTwoByTwoCells

        public abstract int[] getTwoByTwoCells()
        returns a 2X2 cell around a point being interpolated
        Returns:
        a 2X2 block of grid cells
